CreateIndex.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: es.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateIndex
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Username": "xx",
    "IndexName": "xx",
    "IndexType": "xx",
    "InstanceId": "xx",
    "IndexMetaJson": "xx",
    "Password": "xx"
}
CreateIndex.title: 创建自治索引

CreateInstance.document: 根据输入参数创建ES集群实例
CreateInstance.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: es.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateInstance
<公共请求参数>

{
    "EsVersion": "6.4.3",
    "VpcId": "vpc-xxxxxx",
    "NodeInfoList": [
        {
            "NodeType": "ES.S1.SMALL2",
            "NodeNum": "3",
            "Type": "dedicatedMaster"
        },
        {
            "DiskSize": "100",
            "NodeType": "ES.S1.SMALL2",
            "NodeNum": "2",
            "Type": "hotData",
            "DiskType": "CLOUD_SSD"
        }
    ],
    "Zone": "ap-guangzhou-3",
    "ChargeType": "POSTPAID_BY_HOUR",
    "SubnetId": "subnet-xxxxxx",
    "Password": "xxxxxx",
    "InstanceName": "es_test"
}
CreateInstance.title: 创建ES集群实例

CreateLogstashInstance.document: 根据输入参数创建Logstash实例
CreateLogstashInstance.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: es.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateLogstashInstance
<公共请求参数>

{
    "VpcId": "vpc-xxxxxx",
    "LogstashVersion": "6.8.13",
    "Zone": "ap-guangzhou-3",
    "DiskType": "CLOUD_SSD",
    "NodeNum": "3",
    "DiskSize": "100",
    "ChargeType": "POSTPAID_BY_HOUR",
    "SubnetId": "subnet-xxxxxx",
    "NodeType": "LOGSTASH.S1.SMALL2",
    "InstanceName": "logstash_test"
}
CreateLogstashInstance.title: 创建Logstash实例

Host: es.tencentcloudapi.com

<公共请求参数>

        "sg-1",
        "sg-2"
    ]
}

UpdateInstance.document: 用以修改指定ES集群实例的名称
UpdateInstance.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: es.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: UpdateInstance
<公共请求参数>

{
    "InstanceId": "es-xxxxxx",
    "InstanceName": "newName"
}
UpdateInstance.title: 修改ES集群实例名称

UpdateInstance.document: 用以对指定ES集群实例进行横向扩缩容，纵向扩缩容，增加专用主节点，专用主节点横向扩缩容，纵向扩缩容等操作，NodeInfoList要传递目标的全量节点信息
UpdateInstance.title: ES集群节点规格变更

UpdateInstance.document: 用以对指定的ES集群实例的配置进行修改操作
UpdateInstance.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: es.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: UpdateInstance
<公共请求参数>

{
    "InstanceId": "es-xxxxxxxx",
    "EsConfig": "{\"action.destructive_requires_name\":\"true\"}"
}
UpdateInstance.title: 修改ES集群实例配置

UpdateInstance.document: 重置指定ES集群实例Kibana密码
UpdateInstance.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: es.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: UpdateInstance
<公共请求参数>

{
    "InstanceId": "es-xxxxxxxx",
    "Password": "newPwd_123"
}
UpdateInstance.title: 重置Kibana密码

UpdateInstance.document: 用以对集群的节点规格（核数、内存大小）和磁盘大小进行扩缩容操作（当前仅支持纵向扩容）
UpdateInstance.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: es.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: UpdateInstance
<公共请求参数>

{
    "InstanceId": "es-xxxxxxxx",
    "DiskSize": "150",
    "NodeType": "ES.S1.MEDIUM4"
}
UpdateInstance.title: ES集群纵向扩缩容

UpdateLogstashInstance.document: 用以修改指定Logstash实例的名称
UpdateLogstashInstance.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: es.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: UpdateLogstashInstance
<公共请求参数>

{
    "InstanceId": "ls-xxxxxx",
    "InstanceName": "newName"
}
UpdateLogstashInstance.title: 修改Logstash实例名称

UpdateLogstashPipelineDesc.title: 更新实例管道的描述信息

UpdateRequestTargetNodeTypes.document: 对于冷热分离的集群，在温节点节点规格比较小的情况下，可以把来自客户端的请求只发送到热节点上，只让热节点承担协调节点的功能。
UpdateRequestTargetNodeTypes.title: 更新接收客户端请求的节点类型

UpgradeInstance.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: es.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: UpgradeInstance
<公共请求参数>

{
    "InstanceId": "es-xxxxxxxx",
    "EsVersion": "6.4.3"
}
UpgradeInstance.title: 升级ES集群版本
